// <auto-generated by Crisp Source Generator/>
#nullable enable

using Crisp.Runtime.Nodes;

namespace TestApp;

partial class ExprAI
{
    public partial Crisp.Runtime.BtNode Build()
    {
        return new SelectorNode(
            new SequenceNode(
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.DistanceTo(this.Target) < (this.AttackRange * 1.5f))),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Target != null)),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.CurrentState == AIState.Combat)),
                new ActionNode(() => this.Attack(this.Target))),
            new SequenceNode(
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Target.Health > 0)),
                new ConditionNode(() => ((this.MaxHealth - this.Health) <= 50f)),
                new ActionNode(() => this.MoveTo(this.Target.Position))),
            new SequenceNode(
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Name == "Guardian")),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Health > -1)),
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.IsAlive == true)),
                new ActionNode(() => this.Idle())));
    }
}
